metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14158 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: Scrapy 1.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memoryconsumption) via large files because arbitrarily many files are read intomemory, which is especially problematic if the files are then individuallywritten in a separate thread to a slow storage resource, as demonstrated byinteraction between dataReceived (in core/downloader/handlers/http11.py)and S3FilesStore.

criterions.comment: python-scrapy: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
